query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `forum_message_upvotes` (
  `id` varchar(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  `mensagem_id` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `usuario_id` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `criado_em` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_upvotes_mensagem` (`mensagem_id`),
  INDEX `idx_upvotes_usuario` (`usuario_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_upvote` (`mensagem_id`, `usuario_id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `forum_thread_followers` (
  `id` varchar(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  `thread_id` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `usuario_id` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `criado_em` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_followers_thread` (`thread_id`),
  INDEX `idx_followers_usuario` (`usuario_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_follow` (`thread_id`, `usuario_id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `forum_thread_favorites` (
  `id` varchar(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  `thread_id` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `usuario_id` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `criado_em` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_favorites_usuario` (`usuario_id`, `criado_em`),
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_favorite` (`thread_id`, `usuario_id`)
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `forum_thread_followers` (
  `id` varchar(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  `thread_id` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `usuario_id` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `criado_em` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_followers_thread` (`thread_id`),
  INDEX `idx_followers_usuario` (`usuario_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_follow` (`thread_id`, `usuario_id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `forum_thread_favorites` (
  `id` varchar(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  `thread_id` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `usuario_id` varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  `criado_em` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_favorites_usuario` (`usuario_id`, `criado_em`),
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_favorite` (`thread_id`, `usuario_id`)
)
